short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click Funnel goes Viral with Harmon Brothers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey did you see the Squatty Potty or Poopourri commercial's?

One of my favorite companies, ClickFunnels, partnered with Harmon Brothers, and are trying to make their new video go "viral" (whatever that means)...

I got them to hook me (and you) up with a behind-the-scenes pass to watch them go viral (or die trying).

You can get your ticket here: 

https://cfgoesviral.com/private-invitation?cf_affiliate_id=646478&affiliate_id=646478

I'll be watching it live, and hope that you do too!
